AUSTIN (KXAN) If cases and hospitalizations for COVID-19 keep rising, health officials say a return to Stage 4 restrictions are possible.

articles.title: Brazil halts COVID-19 vaccine trial after volunteer has 'severe adverse event' - New York Post
articles.description: Brazil has halted trials of a Chinese-developed COVID-19 vaccine after a volunteer experienced a “severe adverse event,” according to a report. The suspension of the Chinese drugmaker Sinovac…
